title: Becoming Film Literate (2005)
description:
Becoming Film Literate: The Art and Craft of Motion Pictures 

By Vincent A. LoBrutto

Praeger 2005 | 404 Pages | ISBN: 0275981444 | PDF | 26 MB










"To introduce students to the basic tools of cinema, LoBrutto (editing, production design and cinema studies, School of Visual Arts) uses 50 landmark films as illustrations of concepts such as production design, cinematography, sound, narrative structure and genres. Readers learn about film authorship, for example, in a discussion of Citizen Kane and multiplot narrative in a chapter on Nashville.
